PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS, the INSURABLE EARNINGS AND COLLECTION OF PREMIUMS REGULATIONS and the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS which allow small businesses to remit tax withholdings, CPP contributions and EI premiums on a quarterly basis instead of once a month.
